HomeWiki:
Moved to GitHub: https://github.com/DzonnyDZ/Tools

  • Due to ongoing stability and reliability problems with CodePlex SVN interface this project has been moved to GitHub
  • Thanks a lot for folks behind CodePlex for running the site for several years and for pioneering open source for .NET
  • I'll miss the simplicity of SVN :-(

Documentation online

actualized 9.4.2011 for version 1.5.3

ĐTools

Welcome at ĐTools project homepage. ĐTools is an open-source library of various .NET tools that adds some missing functionality into .NET framework. The main content of ĐTools are things I have developed as parts of my other projects, for school projects and at work. There are also several tools developed independently.

The most important tools

New tools

  • Tools.TotalCommanderT.FileSystemPlugin, class that allows creation of Total Commander File System plugins in Visual Basic, C# or any other managed language
  • Assembly postrocessor - attributes-driven Mono.Cecil-powered tool that can postrocess generated assembly or DLL after it's built. (will be included in v 1.5.4)

Currently working on

  • IPTC / Exif (includes powerful sample application) IPTC support si completed for v 1.5.4. What's next? Exif editing & XMP!
  • Total Commander Plugin framework (Lister plugin planned for v1.5.4)
  • Unicode Character Database (planned for v1.5.4)

Đ.
